organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Things will not become any easier this year for Ford in Nascar’s Nextel Cup, with its Japanese rival Toyota joining DaimlerChrysler’s Dodge brand and General Motors’ Chevrolet as Cup rivals.
snippet: Things will not become any easier this year for Ford in Nascar’s Nextel Cup, with its Japanese rival Toyota joining DaimlerChrysler’s Dodge brand and General Motors’ Chevrolet as Cup rivals.
